name: Myturf
tag_list: wireless-advertising, network-providers, on-line-advertising, hyper-local, location-based-advertising, behavioral, privacy, deals, ad-tools
overview:
MyTurf delivers Hyper Local ad content like nothing else.

Started by a creative group of software guys, who believe that online ad content needs to be relevant to the Local Consumer and that no one knows the local online consumer better than the network provider.

We’ve created the worlds only platform that combines the local presence of ISP’s with Local Merchants to deliver advertising content that matters.
